ComicInfo.Summary: While exploring an immense cavern just on the outside of town limits, four kids accidentally destroy the egg of one of the cave's deadliest inhabitants. Blindly fleeing from certain death, three manage to escape without harm but one is left behind in the panic to face the wrath of the enraged creature alone! The three that got away look to the only person that can help - Meriem Cooper, Cavewoman!
